trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the ki-rin fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The ki-rin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ki-rin makes two Hoof attacks and one Horn attack, or it makes two Sacred Fire attacks.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Horn
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Sacred Fire
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) radiant damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The ki-rin moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack||opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Smite
entries: The ki-rin makes one Hoof, Horn, or Sacred Fire attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ki-rin casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):
